STATE OF MICHIGAN
GRETCHEN WHITMER DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH AND HUMAN SERVICES ROBERT GORDOS
GOVERNOR LANSING DIRECTOR
September 22, 2020
James Risinger
38th Judicial Circuit Court - Family Division
106 East First St
Monroe, MI 48161
RE: License #: CO580201307
Monroe County Youth Center
3600 S. Custer Rd.
Monroe, MI 48161
Dear Mr. Risinger:
This letter is a follow-up to the Departmentâ€™s findings regarding the interim inspection
conducted at your facility on 09/22/2020. The purpose of this inspection was to determine
compliance with applicable licensing statutes and administrative rules for Court Operated
Residential Care Facility .
No violations were found. However, Technical Assistance was provided regarding
release reports. The facility was advised to provide detailed information on the release
report, about the person the resident is released to.
Please contact me with any questions. In the event that I am not available and you need
to speak to someone immediately, please contact the local office at (269) 337-5289.
Sincerely,
Heather Reilly, Licensing Consultant
MDHHS\Division of Child Welfare Licensing
22 Center Street
Ypsilanti, MI 48198
(734) 660-8309
